channel.title: Game won't start
channel.description:
I downloaded the game, everything works.
I changed the resolution, and it stopped working. I left, and whenever I try to go in now it pops up
Warning! Failed to create D3D device! Please see [url]https://support.steampowered.com/csi-bin/steampowered.cfg/php/enduser/std_adp.php?p_faqid=722[/url]
(the link does not work for me).
How do I fix this! I tried uninstalling, then reinstalling. Still does not work. Sorry if this is posted somewhere else.

item.title: Game won't start
item.dc:creator: tycharp
item.description:
Nevermind! To those having this problem:

Go to Steam.
Go to Black Mesa in your Library.
Right click it.
Click Properties.
Click Set Launch Options.
In the box, type -w 1024 -h 720 exactly.
Click OK.
Launch the game.

(I got this info from a thread from another forum).

Read full topic

item.title: Game won't start
item.dc:creator: tycharp
item.description:
I downloaded the game, everything works.

I changed the resolution, and it stopped working. I left, and whenever I try to go in now it pops up

Warning!
Failed to create D3D device! Please see https://support.steampowered.com/csi-bin/steampowered.cfg/php/enduser/std_adp.php?p_faqid=722

(the link does not work for me).

How do I fix this! I tried uninstalling, then reinstalling. Still does not work. Sorry if this is posted somewhere else.

Read full topic
